item.description: [...] 750 Words This site is just the most rockin’ writing site in the world. If you ever tried to do Morning Pages, a la Julia Cameron, this the online version. No Artist dates or any of that other hoo-hah, just 750 of brain cleanout out every day. Like taking a shower. I feel clean when I’m through. Plus, he gives you BADGES!!!! [...]
item.content:encoded: […] 750 Words This site is just the most rockin’ writing site in the world.  If you ever tried to do Morning Pages, a la Julia Cameron, this the online version.  No Artist dates or any of that other hoo-hah, just 750 of brain cleanout out every day.  Like taking a shower.  I feel clean when I’m through. Plus, he gives you BADGES!!!! […]
